sentences.sentence: The Merseysiders are unbeaten in eight in all competitions, reaching the semi-finals of the FA Cup.
sentences.translation: 默西·塞德人在各项比赛中八场不败，打进了足总杯半决赛。

sentences.sentence: The Old Lady has been keen on the Spanish international but they have failed to reach an agreement with the Merseysiders over his fee.
sentences.translation: 老妇人一直关注西班牙球星，但他们未能与利物浦就转会费问题未能达成一致。

sentences.sentence: The former West ham United man is all too aware of last season's painful semi-final exit to the Merseysiders in the UEFA Champions League.
sentences.translation: 这位前西汉姆球员觉得上赛季欧冠在半决赛输给利物浦实在太痛苦了。
